brand.name: Neil Patel
brand.primaryCTA: Let’s Grow Your Revenue Through Digital Marketing.

audienceSignals: businesses looking to grow revenue through digital marketing

valueProps.text: Offers a variety of resources to help businesses succeed

pains: Need for revenue growth through digital marketing
proof: Clients include HP, SoFi, Mitsubishi Motors, Champion, ESPN, Adobe, Western Union, Accor, CNN, PWC, DIRECTV, LinkedIn, Ricoh, Tata, Tektronix, Intuit

facts.text: Neil Patel offers services in multiple languages including English, Portuguese, German, Spanish, Italian, Dutch, and French.
facts.evidence: English (EN), Português (BR), Deutsch (DE), Español (ES), Italiano (IT), Nederlands (NL), Français (FR)

facts.text: Neil Patel's primary call to action is 'Let’s Grow Your Revenue Through Digital Marketing.'
facts.evidence: Let’s Grow Your Revenue Through Digital Marketing.

facts.text: Neil Patel's agency is globally recognized.
facts.evidence: Globally Recognized Working With Renowned Brands

facts.text: Neil Patel's agency works with renowned brands such as HP, SoFi, Mitsubishi Motors, Champion, ESPN, Adobe, Western Union, Accor, CNN, PWC, DIRECTV, LinkedIn, Ricoh, Tata, Tektronix, Intuit.
facts.evidence: Globally Recognized Working With Renowned Brands

facts.text: Neil Patel's agency is described as an award-winning global ad agency.
facts.evidence: Meet My Award-Winning Global Ad Agency

facts.text: Neil Patel's agency has a presence in countries like the United States, Canada, Brazil, India, Australia, United Kingdom, Japan, Malaysia, Germany, Hong Kong, Singapore, France, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, and Mexico.
facts.evidence: United States, Canada, Brazil, India, Australia, United Kingdom, Japan, Malaysia, Germany, Hong Kong, Singapore, France, Italy, Netherlands, Spain, Argentina, Chile, Colombia, Mexico

facts.text: Neil Patel offers resources such as a Digital Marketing Blog, AnswerThePublic, AdsGrader, and Ubersuggest.
facts.evidence: Neil Patel’s Digital Marketing Blog, AnswerThePublic, AdsGrader, Ubersuggest

facts.text: Neil Patel's Digital Marketing Blog provides tips, trends, and strategies for building a successful online business.
facts.evidence: Neil Patel’s Digital Marketing Blog Your #1 resource for digital marketing tips, trends, and strategy to help you build a successful online business.

facts.text: AnswerThePublic is a free search insights tool offered by Neil Patel.
facts.evidence: Find out what your audience is searching for online with our free search insights tool.

facts.text: AdsGrader provides in-depth campaign analysis to optimize ad spend and increase ROI.
facts.evidence: Get in-depth campaign analysis now so you can optimize ad spend, increase ROI, and reach your target audience more effectively than ever before.
